div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 722 Dorotskoe, Dubossary raion, Molda- via, 1965 Burial: shortly after 340 B.C. (Golenko) Contents: 290+ AR. Pot hoard Tyra: 128 dr. (as AMNG I.1, pl. 12, 10 [4 basic variants]) Istrus: 150 dr. (as AMNG I.1, 411 [3], 412 [2], 415 [1], 426 [35], 427 [32], 429 [7], 431 [3], 432 [51], 433 [4]; SCN III [1960], p. 389, no. 7 [1]; type of NZ 1917, p. 105, no. 445a [1]) 6 fr. (as AMNG I.1, 446 [3]; SCN III [1960], p. 392, no. 36 [3]) Imit.Istrus: 6 dr. (imit. of AMNG I.1, 432 [5], 433 [1]) Disposition: Kishinev 263; Moscow 1, priv. coll. 26 Nudel'man, Trudy Gosudarstvennogo istoriko- kraevedcheskogo muzeia Moldavskoî SSR 2 (Kishinev, 1969), pp. 121-8 NSf 4 (1971), pp. 78-82 † Zagainaîlo and Nudel'man, "Dorotskiî klad drevnegrecheskikh serebrianykh monet IV v. do. i.e.," MASP 7 (1971), pp. 122-37
